price: 19. Bomilakisa te epai ya Allah na kosalela ye lolendo. Ya solo, nayeli bino elembo ya polele.
arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-an lā taʿlū ʿalā al-lahi innī ātīkum bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
